global.title: KeyRacer - The Ultimate Keyboard Racing Championship
global.description: KeyRacer is a comprehensive skill development platform combining typing practice, coding challenges, and professional communication skills training. Improve your typing speed, learn programming through interactive exercises, and enhance your professional skills.

home.title: KeyRacer - The Ultimate Keyboard Racing Championship

typingTest.title: Typing Test - Improve Your Typing Speed | KeyRacer
typingTest.description: Test and improve your typing speed with KeyRacer's advanced typing test. Get real-time WPM, accuracy metrics, and compete on global leaderboards.
typingTest.keywords: typing test, typing speed test, wpm test, typing practice, keyboard speed, typing accuracy

codeRacer.title: CodeRacer - Learn Programming Through Interactive Typing | KeyRacer
codeRacer.description: Master programming languages through interactive typing exercises. Practice Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Java, and more with real-world code examples.
codeRacer.keywords: code typing, programming practice, learn coding, interactive programming, code exercises, programming tutorial

challenges.title: Coding Challenges - Test Your Programming Skills | KeyRacer
challenges.description: Challenge yourself with KeyRacer's programming exercises. Solve coding problems, improve your algorithm skills, and track your progress.
challenges.keywords: coding challenges, programming problems, algorithm practice, coding exercises, programming skills

proSkills.title: Professional Skills Lab - Business Communication Practice | KeyRacer
proSkills.description: Enhance your professional communication skills with KeyRacer's templates and practice for resumes, cover letters, business emails, and more.
proSkills.keywords: professional skills, business writing, resume practice, cover letter, business email, communication skills

leaderboard.title: Global Leaderboard - Compete Worldwide | KeyRacer
leaderboard.description: See how you rank against typists worldwide on KeyRacer's global leaderboard. Track top performers and challenge yourself to reach the top.
leaderboard.keywords: typing leaderboard, global ranking, typing competition, fastest typists, typing championship

about.title: About KeyRacer - Our Mission and Team | KeyRacer
